Articles.Content: I want to have somebody buy this game for me, but doesn't like PayPal. Can you (quickly, please) add another payment method?
They've sent a private jet to your house, and you can bring your PC directly to their office to have Harvester personally install it for you.

If you have a credit card, you can use PayPal without having an account, as far as I recall... it accepts all standard credit cards, IIRC.

Indeed. Your uncle can use any common credit card to pay through PayPal without having to have an account with them.

Good luck!

Oh, really? I wasn't aware one could use debit cards. Hmm. Might depend on the card type, then...

I used a Visa Debit card and it worked perfectly. I also don't have an account with PayPal.

You can use any card that has the VISA or MASTERCARD logo on it. This includes credit cards, debit cards, gift cards, one-time use cards, etc. This is the same for any store that accepts those two networks for payment.

Cheers!

Sorry, if your country does not support PayPal, then there is nothing we can do currently. You can try selecting some other country, but I don't know how PayPal will handle that. This is really an issue with PayPal and nothing to do with us.

Unfortunately, PayPal is the only cost effective method of payment for Squad being based in Mexico. They do want to have additional payment methods in the future, but for now this is the only option.

Cheers!
